short_description: oxford private care is a home health care services provider based in oxford, united kingdom.
long_description: oxford private care is a leading provider of home care services in oxfordshire and extending across the south of england for our live-in care service. providing high quality care services for the elderly and dependent individuals. we are a leading, people-centred care company, committed to both clients and our employees. read more 24 hour support to live in your own home, offering a real alternative to residential care, "your care, your home, your choice". set up in the early 1980s, oxford private care is a family-run, independent business which has developed and grown to become a leading care provider in oxfordshire. we are members of ukhca (united kingdom home care association ltd), who represent providers of personal care, including nursing care to people in their own homes. linked to our vision are our values. we have developed three core values that are reflected in how we make decisions, deliver care, work together and develop the company in the future. we have developed a client care charter which ensures our commitment to our clients.

generated_description: oxford private care, legally known as oxford private care ltd., is a family-run, independent business based in oxford, england. established in the early 1980s, it has grown to become a leading provider of home care services in oxfordshire and the south of england. the company offers a range of care services, including hourly and live-in care for the elderly and dependent individuals. oxford private care is accredited and contracted by oxfordshire social and community services, and it collaborates with local doctors, district nurses, and other agencies to provide comprehensive care. the company is a member of the united kingdom home care association ltd. and the oxfordshire association of care providers. it is regularly inspected by the care quality commission (cqc) and adheres to a client care charter emphasizing commitment, professionalism, and respect.
